title: Pears and Sweet Potato Mash
ingredients: ['2 pears, peeled and sliced', '125ml dry white wine', '4 tablespoons water', '3 sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed', '250ml evaporated milk', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract', '4 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '30g butter', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg']
